name: Glaive (itch)
description:
Endles action game Glaive. Made by Bilkent Game Developeres.

Controls

- W A S D for movement.

- Mouse position will decide where your glaive will be thrown, left mouse button will throw the glaive, right mouse button will teleport to it. You can press and hold right mouse button to be invisible/invincible until you release it or glaive time expires,

- Avoid contact as long as you can.
